question: 请解释这句话：Good Morning! Welcome to DBS Help & Support Bank Credit Card General Help Borrow Invest Insure Featured Article Your Guide to Submit Card Transaction Dispute Learn what you should do when you find an unauthorised card transaction on your DBS/POSB card statement. Article DBS/POSB Anti-Malware Security Features Find out what we are doing to better protect you from malware threats and scams. Article Security Guide on Scams and Fraud Attempts Find out what you should do and how you can prevent yourself from becoming a victim to an alleged scam or fraud attempt. Article Waive Credit Card / Cashline Fees & Charges Submit your waiver request for an annual fee, finance or late charge via our digital services. Article Replace Credit/Debit/ATM Card Holding on to a damaged, worn out or lost your card? Request for a card replacement instantly using our self-service options. Article Retrieval of Printed Account Statements You can request for a printed copy of your account statement via digibank. To access your statements anytime, anywhere, enrol for eStatements. Article Check Credit Card Transaction Details Trying to recall your past transactions? You can now view more details of your transactions via digibank mobile! Article Purchase your Cashier’s Order Online Have your cashier’s order mailed to you or pick it up at your selected branch after 2PM the next working day. Article Apply for PayNow Register your PayNow Profile instantly via DBS digibank. Article Managing Your Existing Home Loan Your home loan is one of your biggest financial commitments. Let us help you manage it better. Article Safety Switch Our Safety Switch allows you to block access to your funds immediately. Article Check Account Transaction You can check your transactions using digibank online, digibank mobile and Phone Banking. Article Lost or Stolen Card If your ATM, Debit or Credit card is Lost or Stolen, please block your card(s) immediately using our online services and request for a replacement instantly. Article Payment Controls Total card security in your hands. Protect your cards with DBS Payment Controls on digibank app anytime, anywhere. Article Unable to Withdraw and Transact Common reasons include exceeding daily withdrawal limit, using an expired or blocked card, card not activated for overseas usage or not supported by overseas ATM. Guide SmartBuddy FAQ's Refer to our FAQ's about the Smart Buddy Programme. Article DBS/POSB Transaction Codes & Descriptions Understand the meaning of the different transaction codes and descriptions in your statement. Article View your eStatements and eAdvices Simply login to digibank to access and view your statements or retail advices online at your convenience. Article Transfer Funds to Overseas Account digibank allows you to perform Overseas Funds Transfer to over 150 markets in more than 20 currencies anywhere, anytime. Article Timing and Limits for Overseas Funds Transfer Overseas Funds Transfer will generally be completed within 2 to 4 working days. With DBS Remit, you can now perform same day transfers to selected markets within the cut-off times. Useful Guides Guide Your Guide to Online Security Find out the different measures that DBS take to deter online threats and learn how you can enhance your online security by following our useful tips. Guide Your Guide to Overseas Funds Transfer Find all the answers you need to send money online and on time. Guide Your Guide to Card Replacements Had your card replaced? Here are some important information you need to take note of. Guide Your Guide to digibank Discover new ways to bank conveniently and safely with these services at your fingertips. Guide Your Guide to Bill Payment Your one-stop guide to all your queries regarding bill payment. Guide Your Guide To Online Equity Trading Learn all the features that we offer on the equity trading platform. Guide Guide to your Digital Token For enhanced security and greater convenience for all your online and mobile banking transactions, start using your Digital Token. Guide Your Guide to DBS Paylah! Your one-stop guide to all your queries regarding application, operation and management of your DBS PayLah! App. Guide Your Guide to DBS Vickers Online Trading Account Your one-stop guide to provide help and assistance in answering your queries on trading using your DBS Vickers Online Trading Account. Guide Your Guide to Card Security Concerned over the growing cases of financial frauds? Learn how you can protect your Credit, Debit and ATM card information, and the importance of card security. Guide Go Shopping with DBS Online shopping is convenient and can often save you money. Guide Go Travel with DBS Whether you are hitting the road or taking to the skies, we have useful information that can help you travel worry free. Digital Services Discover new ways to bank conveniently and safely with these services at your fingertips. Find out more

Article Security Guide on Scams and Fraud Attempts Find out what you should do and how you can prevent yourself from becoming a victim to an alleged scam or fraud attempt. Article Waive Credit Card / Cashline Fees & Charges Submit your waiver request for an annual fee, finance or late charge via our digital services. Article Replace Credit/Debit/ATM Card Holding on to a damaged, worn out or lost your card? Request for a card replacement instantly using our self-service options. Article Retrieval of Printed Account Statements You can request for a printed copy of your account statement via digibank. To access your statements anytime, anywhere, enrol for eStatements. Article Check Credit Card Transaction Details Trying to recall your past transactions? You can now view more details of your transactions via digibank mobile! Article Purchase your Cashier’s Order Online Have your cashier’s order mailed to you or pick it up at your selected branch after 2PM the next working day. Article Apply for PayNow Register your PayNow Profile instantly via DBS digibank. Article Managing Your Existing Home Loan Your home loan is one of your biggest financial commitments. Let us help you manage it better. Article Safety Switch Our Safety Switch allows you to block access to your funds immediately. Article Check Account Transaction You can check your transactions using digibank online, digibank mobile and Phone Banking. Article Lost or Stolen Card If your ATM, Debit or Credit card is Lost or Stolen, please block your card(s) immediately using our online services and request for a replacement instantly. Article Payment Controls Total card security in your hands. Protect your cards with DBS Payment Controls on digibank app anytime, anywhere. Article Unable to Withdraw and Transact Common reasons include exceeding daily withdrawal limit, using an expired or blocked card, card not activated for overseas usage or not supported by overseas ATM. Guide SmartBuddy FAQ's Refer to our FAQ's about the Smart Buddy Programme. Article DBS/POSB Transaction Codes & Descriptions Understand the meaning of the different transaction codes and descriptions in your statement. Article View your eStatements and eAdvices Simply login to digibank to access and view your statements or retail advices online at your convenience. Article Transfer Funds to Overseas Account digibank allows you to perform Overseas Funds Transfer to over 150 markets in more than 20 currencies anywhere, anytime. Article Timing and Limits for Overseas Funds Transfer Overseas Funds Transfer will generally be completed within 2 to 4 working days. With DBS Remit, you can now perform same day transfers to selected markets within the cut-off times. Useful Guides Guide Your Guide to Online Security Find out the different measures that DBS take to deter online threats and learn how you can enhance your online security by following our useful tips. Guide Your Guide to Overseas Funds Transfer Find all the answers you need to send money online and on time. Guide Your Guide to Card Replacements Had your card replaced? Here are some important information you need to take note of. Guide Your Guide to digibank Discover new ways to bank conveniently and safely with these services at your fingertips. Guide Your Guide to Bill Payment Your one-stop guide to all your queries regarding bill payment. Guide Your Guide To Online Equity Trading Learn all the features that we offer on the equity trading platform. Guide Guide to your Digital Token For enhanced security and greater convenience for all your online and mobile banking transactions, start using your Digital Token. Guide Your Guide to DBS Paylah! Your one-stop guide to all your queries regarding application, operation and management of your DBS PayLah! App. Guide Your Guide to DBS Vickers Online Trading Account Your one-stop guide to provide help and assistance in answering your queries on trading using your DBS Vickers Online Trading Account. Guide Your Guide to Card Security Concerned over the growing cases of financial frauds? Learn how you can protect your Credit, Debit and ATM card information, and the importance of card security. Guide Go Shopping with DBS Online shopping is convenient and can often save you money. Guide Go Travel with DBS Whether you are hitting the road or taking to the skies, we have useful information that can help you travel worry free. Article Security Guide on Scams and Fraud Attempts Find out what you should do and how you can prevent yourself from becoming a victim to an alleged scam or fraud attempt. Article Waive Credit Card / Cashline Fees & Charges Submit your waiver request for an annual fee, finance or late charge via our digital services. Article Replace Credit/Debit/ATM Card Holding on to a damaged, worn out or lost your card? Request for a card replacement instantly using our self-service options. Article Retrieval of Printed Account Statements You can request for a printed copy of your account statement via digibank. To access your statements anytime, anywhere, enrol for eStatements. Article Check Credit Card Transaction Details Trying to recall your past transactions? You can now view more details of your transactions via digibank mobile! Article Purchase your Cashier’s Order Online Have your cashier’s order mailed to you or pick it up at your selected branch after 2PM the next working day. Article Apply for PayNow Register your PayNow Profile instantly via DBS digibank. Article Managing Your Existing Home Loan Your home loan is one of your biggest financial commitments. Let us help you manage it better. Article Safety Switch Our Safety Switch allows you to block access to your funds immediately. Article Check Account Transaction You can check your transactions using digibank online, digibank mobile and Phone Banking. Article Lost or Stolen Card If your ATM, Debit or Credit card is Lost or Stolen, please block your card(s) immediately using our online services and request for a replacement instantly. Article Payment Controls Total card security in your hands. Protect your cards with DBS Payment Controls on digibank app anytime, anywhere. Article Unable to Withdraw and Transact Common reasons include exceeding daily withdrawal limit, using an expired or blocked card, card not activated for overseas usage or not supported by overseas ATM. Guide SmartBuddy FAQ's Refer to our FAQ's about the Smart Buddy Programme. Article DBS/POSB Transaction Codes & Descriptions Understand the meaning of the different transaction codes and descriptions in your statement. Article View your eStatements and eAdvices Simply login to digibank to access and view your statements or retail advices online at your convenience. Article Transfer Funds to Overseas Account digibank allows you to perform Overseas Funds Transfer to over 150 markets in more than 20 currencies anywhere, anytime. Article Timing and Limits for Overseas Funds Transfer Overseas Funds Transfer will generally be completed within 2 to 4 working days. With DBS Remit, you can now perform same day transfers to selected markets within the cut-off times.
